title: A note on edge colorings distinguishing all triangles in a graph
abstract:
We consider edge colorings of a graph in such a way that each two different
triangles have distinct colorings. It is an extension of the well-known idea of
distinguishing all maximal stars in a graph. It was introduced in literature in
1985 and studied by many authors in various variants, but always for stars. We
estimate new invariants regarding triangles for proper and general colorings.
